snippet: Retailers continued to disappoint investors, and profits fell at Goldman Sachs and Citigroup.
abstract: Stocks lose ground, retreating from previous day's gains, amid crop of disappointing company reports.
lead_paragraph: Retailers continued to disappoint investors, and profits fell at Goldman Sachs and Citigroup.

headline.main: Gloom Descends as Earnings Fall Short
headline.print_headline: Gloom Descends as Earnings Fall Short
